file.string: Please click the device you want use
Device is activating, pleast wait for a moment

There are not any online plugs, please keep a plug online and pull down to refresh the devices list, then click the retry button
There are not any lights in your device list, please configure a light first
Pull down to refresh device list
Please long click the device and select Upgrade device
You have learned to use plug, please click exit.
Click the menu button and select Upgrade online
Not found any devices, please pull down again or click exit
There are not any local devices can upgrade in your device list
You have learned to use plugs, please click exit.
There are not any remotes in your device list, please configure a remote first

Post command failed, please check you network and plug, then click OK again
There are not any flammable devices in your device list, please configure a flammable device first
There are not any online plugs, please keep a plugs online and pull down to refresh the devices list, then click the retry button

Get data failed, please check your network, then pull down to refresh

Enter all the commands and click OK
Pull down to refresh the newest data

获取数据失败，请检查一下您的网络状况, 再下拉刷新
设备需要升级才能使用
用户名或邮箱格式不合规则
用户名或邮箱已被注册
发送命令失败，请检查您的网络和Plugs，然后再点击确认
此设备不支持本地使用
您已经学会了使用Plugs，请点击退出。
您已经学会了使用Flammable，请点击退出
没有找到升级文件, 请将升级文件放入手机 根目录/Espressif/local_bin/下

您已经学会了如何升级设备
配置结束，因当前连接的WIFI与配置的WIFI不同，无法收到反馈，请自行检查结果。

点击菜单图标，点击选择日期可查看所选日期的数据
